alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coffee and western Jeff Davis Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout near West Green, or near Broxton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds around 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst, Broxton, Pridgen, West Green, Snipesville and Denton. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
